title: Matchsafe, "Motor Car", ca. 1902
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, curved corners, featuring raised decoration of male in suit and cap driving motor car with spoked wheels down country road, grassy hill, wooden fence and tree in background, as well as patch of grass in foreground. Some clouds evident on lid. Reverse features inscription WH, Nov.22, 1902. Lid hinged on side. Striker in recessed groove on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Motor Car", ca. 1902.
ca. 1902. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-97.
